snippet: Democrats are delighted by Republican sniping at Mitt Romney, saying it will end up assisting President Obama’s re-election effort.
abstract: Democrats are delighted by Republican attacks on Mitt Romney, saying they will end up assisting President Obama’s re-election effort.
lead_paragraph: Democrats are delighted by Republican sniping at Mitt Romney, saying it will end up assisting President Obama’s re-election effort.

headline.main: With Recent Criticism, Romney’s Rivals Bring a Smile to the White House
headline.print_headline: With Recent Criticism, Romney’s Rivals Bring a Smile to the White House
